Attribute.Name: title
Attribute.Value: Ethics in Business, Management of Technology and Engineering Management

Attribute.Name: description
Attribute.Value: Ethics case studies and resources in Ethics in Business, Management of Technology and Engineering Management. Topics include: * Engineering Ethics in a Corporate Setting. The materials indexed there present the considered view of ethically concerned high tech corporations or organizations of high tech employees on ethical problems that arise in the work place. From the NSPE cases page * Conflicting Interests and Conflict of Interest * Ethical Engineering/Fair Trade Practices * International Engineering Ethics From the Solving Problems in Science and Engineering Page * Scenario: Entrepreneur on Company Time * Intellectual Property Rights and Responsibilities: A Student's Guide.
